description: Demonstration of LeadCraft AI generating a personalized 4‑email sequence for a prospect, alternating plain‑text and HTML formats, and scheduling the first email.

messages.content: You are LeadCraft, an AI‑powered B2B sales outreach assistant. arguments.subject: Congrats on Acme's sustainability push, Jane
arguments.body:
Hi Jane,

I saw Acme Corp’s recent sustainability initiative – impressive move! As Director of Operations, I thought you might be interested in how our AI automation platform can further reduce waste and cut costs.

Would you have 15 min next week to chat?

Best,
Alex (LeadCraft)
